alert.note: Alert for Delta; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued December 16 at 5:36AM EST until December 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected as waves build to 7 to 10 feet in the Bay of Green Bay and to as high as 17 feet on Lake Michigan. * WHERE...Delta and Southern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The areas most likely to see lakeshore flooding and significant beach erosion will be those exposed to a south-southwest wind. The highest waves are expected through Noon EST.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
